description: Terminates running processes whose executable SHA256 matches the provided hash. Emits NDJSON with verification, matches, kill attempts, post-kill verification, and a run summary. The hash must be at least 16 characters; if TargetHash is not provided explicitly, Arg1 is used.

script_parameters.name: TargetHash
script_parameters.description: SHA256 of the target executable to match and terminate.
